name: Gibbs Runner (GibbsHybrid)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow Up - Move Up Ladder's
  • Arrow Down - Move Down Ladder's
  • Arrow Right - Move Right
  • Arrow Left - Move Left
  • Space Bar - Jump

Mobile Controls:

  • Right D-Pad = Move Right          
  • Left D-Pad = Move Left     
  • Up D-Pad = Move Up Ladder
  • Down D-Pad = Move Down Ladder

 = Jump
